entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Toronto Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:47 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto City Centre Airport 08:50 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.9°C
Pressure: 102.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -7.4°C
Wind: NE 35 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Snow at times heavy beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 early this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets with risk of freezing rain. Local snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High zero.
